comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.titantv.com/Default.aspx?r=t](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.titantv.com%2FDefault.aspx%3Fr%3Dt) ### Comment > With Adguard extension turned on in Edge, the TitanTV website won't function beyond the initial page load. Clicking to change anything (like day or lineup) results in the message box "Loading, Please wait". As soon as I pause Adguard, the webpage functions normally again. This happens in both the Edge and Chrome browsers on my Windows 10 desktop PC. ### Screenshots

you get:

The website doesn't load properly on any of the pages where you can watch a video and all of the videos are gone. I know it is specifically with adguard cause I disabled all of the verious block lists in ublock origins one by one til I found it and loaded all of them one by one to make sure it was only one that was wrong.
This was working fine not too long ago, a week at most I think. So someone's recent changes screwed this up.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WQB7gyeFPso](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DWQB7gyeFPso) ### Comment Username: @fortunafiorentina > 以前はブロック出来ていた、YouTubeの動画開始前の広告が再生される様になった。 > また、同様に以前はブロック出来ていた、YouTubeのサムネイルに並ぶ広告がブロックされなくなった。 > EDGE用のadguard拡張機能”このページで広告を手動でブロックする"機能を使ったり、フィルタリングログより、対象のmovieを探してユーザールールに追加すると、一時的に解決するが、暫くすると別の広告動画が再生され、根本解決にならない。 > > YouTubeの仕様変更に対応が追い付いていないのでしょうか？ > 或いは私の環境だけの現象でしょうか？ ### Screenshots

@realodix please, take a look

issue.title: Filter issue causing problem with and android app

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

dns.adguard.com

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kaufland.Kaufland&hl=ro&gl=US

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello, on my android device I'm using dns.adguard.com as my private DNS, The issue is with a retailer app (kaufland app -package:com.kaufland.Kaufland). Since an update about 3 weeks ago, whenever I try to access the leaflet (the supermarket catalogue) from within the app get a network error. If I revert the phone to my ISP DNS, the app works normal, so I guess it is a bad AdGuard filter. Can you please fix it? Thanks.


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75840436/173083326-98640e6a-7519-44c1-bcf6-44c65e5ccd71.mp4




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
>@AdamWr please check.

Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
Promo offers load correctly on my end (I have checked it with DNS set to AdGuard DNS).

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard Browser Extension, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: Filter issue causing problem with and android app

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

dns.adguard.com

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kaufland.Kaufland&hl=ro&gl=US

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello, on my android device I'm using dns.adguard.com as my private DNS, The issue is with a retailer app (kaufland app -package:com.kaufland.Kaufland). Since an update about 3 weeks ago, whenever I try to access the leaflet (the supermarket catalogue) from within the app get a network error. If I revert the phone to my ISP DNS, the app works normal, so I guess it is a bad AdGuard filter. Can you please fix it? Thanks.


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75840436/173083326-98640e6a-7519-44c1-bcf6-44c65e5ccd71.mp4




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
